item.title: Hack The Box: Cap
item.description: Here’s my write-up for Cap, a CTF challenge created by InfoSecJack. Write-up I deployed the box using HTB’s interface and scanned the host using nmap: └─$ nmap 10.129.70.0 -sC -sV Starting Nmap 7.92 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2022-07-22 08:32 EDT Nmap scan report for 10.129.70.0 Host is up (0.062s latency). Not shown: 997 closed tcp ports (conn-refused) PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 21/tcp open ftp vsftpd 3.0.3 22/tcp open ssh OpenSSH 8.
